resources.string: Unable to access location. Please enable one or more location providers.
Thank you for participating in the %s.
Are you sure you want to register for the %1$s?
Are you sure you want to register for the %1$s? This will overwrite the %2$s.
Unable to fetch tour configuration from server.

By default we will automatically start getting your location when you are on the starting line. We highly recommend you keep this setting enabled, but if you want, you can disable this behavior below:
Let us know when you will be at the starting line on %1$s.
Your start time is before the official tour start time of %s.
Your finish time is after the official tour end time of %s.
Start time is after the race has completed.
Finish time is before start time.
Your start time is in the past.

TourTrak is intended to improve organizers\' course awareness and to provide data that can help improve future tours. It has been developed and tested to have a minimal as possible effect on devices in which it is installed, including battery use, to require no user interaction during the course of its active operation, and to collect data that is anonymous to all parties. \n\n By installing this app you agree that all persons and organizations involved in developing, sponsoring and distributing the TourTrak app shall be held harmless in the unlikely event of any real or perceived loss or damage resulting from its use.

TourTrak is intended to improve organizers\' course awareness and to provide data that can help improve future tours. It has been developed and tested to have a minimal as possible effect on devices in which it is installed, including battery use, to require no user interaction during the course of its active operation, and to collect data that is anonymous to all parties.\n\nBy installing this app you agree that all persons and organizations involved in developing, sponsoring and distributing the TourTrak app shall be held harmless in the unlikely event of any real or perceived loss or damage resulting from its use.
You must agree to the tracking terms to register.
Registration for the tour failed. Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to unregister from this tour?
You have been unregistered from the tour. Relaunch the app if you want to re-register later.
You have not received any messages from %s.
The tour schedule has changed. Please enter your new start time.
